introResponse: Okay! I love stories! Thing is though, I have so many to tell! Which do you wanna hear?
giveDescription: Oooh, that's a good one! Here's a little more info on it:
wbu: So, waddaya think? Wanna hear it?
naw: Nawww, okies. How about one of these ones?
itsova: Thanks for reading! Maybe I can interest you in another story?
